title: Baoh Raihousha (Baoh the Visitor)
synopsis: An innocent young man, Ikuroo, has a parasite known as Baoh implanted in his brain by an evil organization, Doress. The parasite makes him nearly immortal and gives him the ability to transform into a really powerful beastie when he's in trouble.
voices: ['Hori, Hideyuki', 'Hidaka, Noriko', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Ikeda, Shuuichi', 'Inoue, You']
staff: [['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Terada, Kenji', ['Script']], ['Machida, Yoshito', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Araki, Hirohiko', ['Original Creator']]]
